name: Defending Boxes(beta access)
description:
This is just a beta version of my game hope you will enjoy it.

Read this instruction before playing this game:

In the game you will find:

1: one red box.

2. one yellow box.

3. 6 pipes one facing up one facing down

4.  one enemy cannon

The things to do with these game:

The red box and the yellow box are the player player have to move both the boxes in order to protect them self from enemy's bullet attack there is a grey space between the both red and yellow boxes in which if the enemy's bullet enters player's score rises by 1.

In order to give an obstacle the pipes are used if any of the box touches the pipes they will respawn to its first position  that is from where the game starts.
